name: 14parsec
description:
Game made for Łódzki Game Jam 7 (site of Global Game Jam).

By:

Michał "Manus" Potakowski - Graphics & Code

Andrzej Żabski - Code

Dawid Piech - Code & Graphics

Mateusz Srebnik - Music & Menu

How to play:

Use your mouse to drag modules to your ship and follow the arrow to deliver package.

To deliver package, drop it into the planet and wait.
